mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE( EMPLOYEE_NO, TEAM_ID, EMAIL, EMPLOYEE_NAME, JOIN_DATE, POSITION_ID, PASSWORD, IS_AUTHORITY, ROLE, LAST_LOGIN) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, 'DEV04', #{email}, #{employeeName}, SYSDATE, 'TEMP', #{password}, 'N', 'USER', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_NO EMPLOYEENO, TEAM_ID TEAMID, (SELECT POSITION_NAME FROM POSITION WHERE POSITION_ID=EMPLOYEE.POSITION_ID) POSITIONNAME, EMAIL, EMPLOYEE_NAME EMPLOYEENAME, JOIN_DATE JOINDATE, POSITION_ID POSITIONID, PASSWORD, ROLE, IS_AUTHORITY ISAUTHORITY, LAST_LOGIN LASTLOGIN FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO=#{employeeNo } AND PASSWORD=#{password }
